Rulings.Edison: ●You must have at least 2 “Crystal Beast” monsters in your Spell & Trap Card Zone when you activate this card and when it resolves. If the number of “Crystal Beast” monsters in your Spell & Trap Card Zone becomes less than 2 due to an effect chained to this card, then you can't Special Summon.
